mapper.insert: insert into todo_list (created, content, finished, loop_type, user_id) values(#{created}, #{content}, #{finished}, #{loopType}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from todo_list where user_id = #{userId} and remind_at <= #{day}
select * from todo_list where user_id = #{userId} and finished >= #{from} and finished <= #{to}
mapper.update: update todo_list set finished = #{finished} where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
